title: What's for Dinner?
description: Giraffe is hungry, but he is tired of eating leaves. How will Giraffe solve his problem? He decides to try to eat foods other animals eat. Humorous, supportive pictures and repetitive phrases allow early readers to be successful.
reviewWords: bending, delicious, giraffe, hanging, otter, tongue
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Identify the story elements of problem and solution
awareness: Initial Blends                : Discriminate initial consonant blend sound /tr/
phonics: Consonant Blends : Identify initial consonant blend tr
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and locate quotation marks
wordWork: Alphabetizing                : List words in alphabetical order
